description: You can usually find Light My Fire Mobile Pizza Co dishing out their delicious pizzas in Citrus County, but being mobile, they’re able to share their yummy eats all throughout Florida.They’re blazing up perfect 10” personal pizzas made with homemade dough and meats, as well as the freshest toppings, like Roma tomatoes, spinach, feta cheese, and more. So come out and try all these tasty pizzas from Light My Fire, and you’ll surely be highly delighted.
name: Light My Fire Mobile Pizza Co
